headline: A Tiny Defense ETF Just Smashed The S&P 500 By Nearly 30% | PPA VOO
summary: The Invesco Aerospace & Defense ETF (NYSEARCA:PPA) has crushed the broader market over the past year, delivering 44% returns compared to the S&P 500’s 16% gain. This outperformance stems from concentrated exposure to defense contractors that benefit when military budgets expand and geopolitical tensions rise.
